LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO20_OUTRO_5: {EXCITED:crazydave}你只是不想同时对付两个疯狂戴夫吧?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}我看到了一块化石, 它好大!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {SAY:winnie}这个猛禽的爪子是开启一个古老恐龙竞技场的钥匙, 戴夫!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}哇哦! 现在是4000年前... 的晚上!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}是的, 戴夫. 夜间的沙漠或许会变得宁静祥和...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}但是木乃伊僵尸还是会来, 还是想要脑子.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT1_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}是时候开始夜间作战了! 带好我们的小喷菇和阳光菇!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT3_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}它们会时不时冒出来, 挡住我们.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT3_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}确实. 免得僵尸趁虚而入.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT4_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}看啊, 潘妮! 这些僵尸正在造小金字塔!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT4_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}它们应该不是在干那种事, 戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT4_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}不过, 看起来它们确实在谋划什么和金字塔有关的事.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT4_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}你应当尽量在它们进攻之前好好准备.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT4_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}确实, 邻居! 今天它们不会来得那么快了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT7_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}特殊的墓碑已经部署, 一点也不喜的惊喜藏于其中.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT7_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}请上交你的脑子, 或者说你更希望我的墓碑摧毁你的防线并且用暴力手段抢走它?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT7_INTRO_6: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}如果我们没有及时拆除这些墓碑, 它们会十分致命.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT7_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}但是, 它们每一个里面都塞着一个巨人, 所以, 也别那么莽撞.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT7_INTRO_8: {SAY:crazydave}卧了个大槽! 不要有压力, 邻居, 但是快一点!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT9_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}有的时候传送带会停止供应某种植物.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT9_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}所以且用且珍惜吧 - 有些植物是限量的.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT10_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}确实. 仪器数据显示一场探险家僵尸冲锋即将到来.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT10_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}幸运的是, 地刺可以防止这些花被踩坏, 这是个特性, 戴夫, 特性.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT10_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}我们应该在冲锋之前及时种好地刺.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT10_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}不要忘了你还有坚果, 邻居! 它们很硬!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT10_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}确实, 戴夫. 沙漠终于变得安静祥和了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT10_OUTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}那么是时候继续打主线了, 邻居! 做得好 !
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT1_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}那闻起来不太对. 僵尸博士在哪?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT1_INTRO_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}与此同时... 让我们种植物.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT1_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我们现在是有土豆雷了? 还是说没有?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT1_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}这些问题或许都可以推到时空悖论上? 真是让人费解...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT1_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}现在我们不用太担心这件事.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}今天我们不需要阳光. 因为我们有传送带.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT4_INTRO_2: {SAY}呃, 邻居, 你能帮忙保护它们吗?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT4_INTRO_3: {SAY}不在上面种植就可以, 它们会茁壮生长的!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}现在僵尸可以组织大型进攻, 可能有3旗或者更多.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT5_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}它们也获得了一些更危险的能力.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT5_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}有的时候, 把输出植物放在后面是个好主意.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT5_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}这样僵尸就很难威胁到它们了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT6_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}: 戴夫, 我们遇到了一点问题.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT6_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}国际植物组织出现了植物短缺的问题.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT6_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}为了贯彻节约节俭, 你不能在草坪上种太多植物.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT6_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}... 这个组织是什么时候成立的?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT6_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}... 9年前? 植物大战僵尸一代什么时候出的?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT6_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}看起来僵尸可以利用沙尘暴快速穿过我们的防线.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT6_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}仪器数据显示, 冰冻, 眩晕或者击退可以立刻停止沙尘暴.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT7_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}你们好啊, 时空穿越者们,
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT7_INTRO_2: {SAY}我已经派专人去拿走你的大脑.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT7_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}请在它们到来之前在合同上签字.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT7_INTRO_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}酷, 僵尸博士想要我的签名!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT7_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}或许我们需要足够的向日葵去应对僵尸大军.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT7_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}两排大概就够了, 如果需要的话, 可以种更多.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT7_INTRO_9: {SAY:winnie}你可以通过我设计的一个小挑战来练习.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT8_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}一定要利用好你所有的植物.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT8_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}如果你觉得时机不对, 你可以把植物暂时储存在传送带中.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT9_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:winnie}否则, 或许你会摧毁现实.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT9_INTRO_4: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}别这样, 邻居! 那样你会有大麻烦!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}有时你面对僵尸大军需要适当使用拖延战术.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}这样可以为你建立稳固的防线争取更多时间.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}土豆雷和冰冻生菜可以胜任这个工作, 未来你也会获得不少可以拖延时间的植物.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_INTRO_4: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}看啊, 潘妮. 我放置了一些黑黄相间的标记!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}... 哦. 你是对的. 我忘了这关还有危险的植物需要保护了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}行动起来吧, 别让它们被僵尸啃死了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}毕竟我们也不能忽略在香蕉手机上发来的S.O.S信号!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_OUTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SPECIAL8}哈, 那只是一个裹着纸筒的僵尸!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_OUTRO_4: {TIRED:winnie}戴夫一直在找机会讲这个笑话.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_OUTRO_5: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}你知道什么比裹着纸筒更好吗? 那就是置身时空乱流中. 我们走!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT0_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}僵尸会掉落叶绿素, 维生素和矿物质含量是牛肉的十倍.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT0_INTRO_4: {PLAYFUL:winnie}这是早餐的必要成分. 拖到植物上来使用它.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT0_INTRO_5: {PLAYFUL:winnie}然后, 植物的特殊能力将被激活.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT0_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}但是, 为了防止时间冲突, 我们首先得先找到叶绿素.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT0_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}所以说, 我们过不去这里?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT0_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}或许你应该去其它时代去寻找叶绿素.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT11_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}啊, 又是这帮木乃伊! 打不完的木乃伊!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT11_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}时空裂隙强化了每个时代的僵尸, 戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT11_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}我们将会遇到一些僵尸的强化形态.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT11_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}反正我还什么都没遇到! 一起摇滚吧!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT14_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}草坪上全都是石头! 真烦人!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT14_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}看起来又是一个坚不可摧关卡. 你觉得你能搞定吗?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT14_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}我的邻居肯定能! 不过是一些死神僵尸...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT14_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}... 和一些水晶骷髅头僵尸! 这有什么难对付的?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT16_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}从现在开始, 关卡都会变得更长.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT16_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}你应该提升自己耐力来应对.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT16_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}一些高费植物是很好用的 - 你也可以带一些控制类植物争取时间.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT16_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}是的! 一味的莽可以让你走得很快...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT16_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}在和僵尸的拉锯战中要更加谨慎!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT16_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}不过僵尸们只会拖着腐烂的脚慢慢挪, 所以也不用过于担心!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT19_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}小心, 戴夫! 今天的阳光很毒!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT19_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}噢. 生命中总是充满了不公!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT19_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}至少你不用拖着腐烂的脚慢慢挪.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT20_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}欢迎, 古老的园丁, 另一个死亡陷阱已经静候多时.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT20_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}你认为只有黑暗时代的亡灵会返乡?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT20_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}准备好对付我的巨人大军... 它们已经来了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT20_INTRO_6: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}别那么紧张! 我们已经赢过它一次了...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT20_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}当然, 我们有把握再赢一次!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT20_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}那是最后一个木乃伊了. 真正的最后.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT20_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}仪器数据显示, 我们的下一个目标是失落之城.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT20_OUTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}好吧, 虽然那些神庙可能很快又会被僵尸占领! 我们走, 潘妮!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT00_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}这看起来是另一道大门, 戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT00_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}我们需要有4个叶绿素槽才能通过这里.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT00_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}或许我们需要先到其它时代去寻找这一项强化.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT21_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们又回到了这片沙漠, 戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT21_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}没时间闲聊了! 僵尸们都迫不及待了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT21_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}不要慌, 戴夫. 看起来僵尸博士已经亮出了它最后的底牌.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT21_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}所有植物的冷却时间都变成了原来的1.5倍.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT21_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}从现在开始, 我们或许需要重新考虑制胜策略.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT21_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}没有什么可以阻止我们这位专业的园丁!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT23_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}僵尸博士调高了温度, 戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT23_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}冰系植物面对僵尸大军已经没那么有效了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT23_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}糟糕! 我的太阳镜呢! 我的芦荟呢!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT25_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}今日天气预报: 干燥, 局部有重甲巨人僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT25_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}仪器数据显示, 屏幕外有一些阳光.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT25_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}或许我们可以利用太阳神僵尸把它们吸进来.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT25_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}我觉得我们会得到意料之外的结局.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT26_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}国际植物组织给了我们一个全新挑战.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT26_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}现在, 我们需要在一段时间内不消耗阳光来取胜.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT26_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}所以现在连阳光资源都需要保护?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT26_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}保护植物, 保护霉菌, 保护阳光资源...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT26_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}技术上来说, 你不用保护你m... 当我没说.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT27_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}这些僵尸真是越来越没耐心了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT27_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}我们本来和它们说好要来一场坚不可摧... 但是它们不太守信.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT27_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}但是我们的植物还是受到了影响, 它们的冷却时间更长了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT27_INTRO_8: {SAY:crazydave}没事, 不就是冷却变慢吗, 咱什么场面没见过?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT29_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}我似乎跟你说过, 你不要再选植物了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT29_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}所以为什么... 我们现在需要用这些玩意打僵尸?我选的明明不是这些啊...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT29_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}我会扩大植物黑名单, 保持一百年. 而且我从此以后会每天检查植物两次.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT29_INTRO_9: {SAY:crazydave}哦. 被抓现行了... 我觉得远这些植物很有趣!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT29_INTRO_10: {SAY:winnie}又不是你打僵尸, 你当然会觉得有趣.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}欢迎回来, 时间旅行者们.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}是时候去认真地将你击败了, 我准备了一支加强版死神僵尸大军.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}起来吧, 我的臣民! 吃掉它们的脑子, 宣告我们的胜利!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_INTRO_5: {SAY:zombossicon}从此以后, 再也不会有植物妨碍我统治所有时间线!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_INTRO_7: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}看起来它要把它手下的心腹大臣派出来了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_INTRO_9: {SAY:winnie}在处理墓碑方面, 不要出任何问题, 否则一切就都完了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}那是最后一个木乃伊僵尸了. 真的真的最后一个了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}我希望我不要再说一次这句话了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}看起来僵尸博士逃回失落之城去召集军队了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_OUTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}回到那个充满秘密的丛林! 我们上, 潘妮!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}尽管四面体是金字塔的形状, 却不是正多面体.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}我好饿. 我想吃蒸剁面皮.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Flashback! I remember this decor from when I chased squirbos as a kid!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Indeed, User Dave. We appear to have arrived in the midst of a Neon Mixtape Tour.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}I suspect the musical tempo may affect the zombies' speeds.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES1_INTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}I'm feeding the rhythm, I'M FEEDING THE RHYTHM!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES2_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}I believe 特点 zombies may display unique abilities while their preferred music is playing.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES2_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}You mean they'll jam their jam when their jam is jamming?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES2_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Yes, correct, yes, and yes, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We have encountered Boombox僵尸, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES5_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They can stun all plants with their charming music for a while.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES5_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Moreover, they can rise from the ground to stun our defenses right away.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES5_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Measures should be taken, should that happen.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES5_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}It's gonna be music to my ears... and our plants'!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES6_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Do you feel that you have grooved? Did you bang your head? Have you dug it?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES6_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Now the party is over! Melt before the musical might of my majestic Hair Metal Gargantuar!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES6_INTRO_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}I'm scared, Penny! It's two minutes to midnight!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES6_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Be brave, User Dave. We'll jilt this ditty... on rock and roll!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES8_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Say Penny, why do we repeat everything we said when we visit certain levels again?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES8_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}These are their own 'dimensions', I would say.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES8_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}When you visit one, you are starting from the beginning of that dimension.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES8_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}Thus time has to flow, affecting everything in here, including us.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES8_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}Is that a made-up, cheesy, unscientific explanation?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES10_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They jam their jams, but their jams aren't their jams anymore!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES10_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Whah? So you mean that the jams to jam to aren't the same anymore?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES10_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:crazydave}All that time traveling and still no Mr. Boss guy!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES10_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Patience, User Dave. I have detected an unusual energy spike in Ancient Egypt.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES10_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}I believe zombies have regrouped there and become stronger for another push.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES10_OUTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}It's time we stepped up our game with this newly acquired source of Plant Food.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES10_OUTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Plant Food, eh? No plant will go hungry anymore! I like the idea already!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES11_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The final era. I suspect that Dr. Zomboss kept a trick up his sleeves.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES11_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}I fear that we will need to weather some of the toughest zombie hordes.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES11_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}So long as we're in the groove, we'll be a-ok!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES12_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Last time we had to work blindly due to the jamming condition.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES12_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Can we assume that this is to be taken literally?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES12_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Don't get blindsided by their dancing prowess, though.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES13_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Hey Penny! I found this arcade machine thingie!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES13_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}Do you think that you can make it work again?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES13_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}There's no time for games, User Dave. There's another horde coming in.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES13_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Aw. But gaming can give me the experience to beat them!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES13_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}Not now, User Dave. We have to act fast.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES13_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}We're not the only one who can use the power of 8-bit technology, after all.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES15_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Along with the microphone swing, it seems that we have a new spinning threat.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES15_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Breakdancers will prove to be a huge threat with... whatever they do with their moves.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES15_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Who needs to breakdance with their head...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES15_INTRO_4: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}WHEN YOU HAVE A POT ON YOUR HEAD INSTEAD???
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES15_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}Your logic still makes no sense as always, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES17_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}One era ago I said I wanted to see Football僵尸 again...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES17_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}And now he's here! Time to get my Hypno-shrooms again!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES17_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}There's always time to watch football after all! Even when you're in your own childhood!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES17_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Be careful with what you wish for, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES17_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}No time to be careful - let's go!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES18_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Welcome, Partying Travellers, to the first of my last traps!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES18_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}I have taken nearly all your plants this time!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES18_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Take them back from me... if you dare!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES18_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}For my challenge will surely make you stumble! Sincerely, Dr. Edgar Zomboss
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES18_INTRO_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}All the sun producing plants... and NEARLY all our offensive plants!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES18_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}Not all hope is lost, User Dave. Surely we can find a way.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES19_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Greetings, Gardeners. It seemed that my last trap didn't quite work out.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES19_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Thus a new scheme was born - now, my zombie army will be fueled by the power of the jams!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES19_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}... and the power of arcade machines as well.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES19_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}But enough details - attack! Signed, Dr. Edgar Zomboss
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES19_INTRO_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}All those arcade machines... imagine when the 8-bit jam shows up!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES19_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}I fear there's more to this than just the shuffling of the 8-bit army.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Well, Gardeners. It seems that you're rather persistent and resilient.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}One of my strongest hordes will now be sent out to dispatch you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}The stage is set; my zombies are ready. Surrender your brain - there will be no other way!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}I can't help it, Penny! We're finally meeting Mr. Boss guy again!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}It seemed like all my schemes and plans have fallen apart, thanks to you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}But even in defeat, there's still hope for me - for I have one last ditch effort to stop you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}I shall now gracefully retreat into the timelines again.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_5: {SAY:zombossicon}Mark my word: You haven't won the war. You have only won the battle.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_9: {SAY:winnie}We can't wallow in misery now, User Dave. We must prepare for when Zomboss comes back.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_10: {TIRED:crazydave}But... all this time... no Mr. Boss guy... what's the point of this trip, then?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_11: {TIRED:winnie}It seems to me that Zomboss is hiding something...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_13: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}*robotic sigh* Here we go again on the road.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_14: {SAY:winnie}You'd think that he would have learned not to charge in after so many battles...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY: {SAY:crazydave}Karaoke time! At last my tangerine dreams will come true!
{SAY:winnie}Caution, User Dave. This dropped mic promises a banned battle of heavy petal proportions!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_PLANTPUZZLE_1_INTRO_: {SAY:winnie}你只有很少的植物和逃脱树根.
{SAY:winnie}通过逃脱树根移动植物来击败僵尸把.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_PLANTPUZZLE_2_INTRO_: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}在有些植物迷阵关卡中你可以使用特定的额外植物.
{SAY:winnie}然而, 你的阳光有限. 所以好好利用它们吧.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_PLANTPUZZLE_8_OUTRO_: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}做的好, 你已经完成了所有8个关卡.
{SAY:winnie}我希望这对你来说是一个有趣的训练.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}嘿, 邻居! 今天我们来玩点好玩的!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_1_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}我们有很多不同种类的保龄泡泡... 这会让游戏更加有趣!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_2_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}你在每个世界打保龄球时都会遇到些波折!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_8_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}保护这些坚果, 就用我们的保龄泡泡和坚果!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_9_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}现在我们有一个可爱的花坛来标记你所能放保龄泡泡的位置!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_9_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}她现在不会参与对话. 她在加油呢.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_9_INTRO_5: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}现在, 闲言少叙, 开始保龄吧!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_10_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}终于到了. 最后的保龄球赛.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_10_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}最后的僵尸在等着被保龄球打飞呢.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_10_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}直觉告诉我如果你做得足够好... 你可以在传送带中获得别的植物?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_10_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}哇哦, 邻居! 你做得太棒了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_10_OUTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}我还从来没有看过这么多次连击呢!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_10_OUTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}这很有趣, 不是吗?用保龄球发泄一些情绪.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_10_OUTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}不过我们现在需要去找僵尸博士了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们需要进一步了解我们的植物.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}从长远看来,这更能帮助我们对付更多的僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}本次,我们将要应用充能柚子.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_1_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}酸酸的~,扑鼻的~…但是,它打出了一记重拳!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_1_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}想必我们能很快的了解它,让我们开始吧!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这次我们将要面临大群的巨人僵尸,戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_3_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}我觉得我们应该选择三阶的充能柚子.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_3_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}它一炮近乎消灭一只巨人的能力不容小觑.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_3_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}浓缩橙汁的力量!戴夫.和注入的等离子体!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}又是一次和巨人僵尸的战斗!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_5_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}但至少这次它们并没有处于危险之中.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_5_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}但是它们被冻住了!离大谱,它们是如何做到在炎热的海滩上被冰冻呢?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_5_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}真是难倒我了.虽然我是一台时间机器,但是有时我对时间的恶作剧没有办法.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_6_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}请你不要拿我的僵尸去当做靶子.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_6_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}所以,风水轮流转,现在轮到你的植物来作为我的僵尸的靶子了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_6_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}我的特殊僵尸拥有我从你的植物中获得的力量,这将确保我是最后的赢家.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_6_INTRO_8: {SAY:crazydave}我跟你说你别害怕啊,它拿一吨橙汁和等离子体能搞出什么花样来?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_6_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我想这足够我撑一段时间了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_6_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}我赞同,我觉得是时候结束我们的训练了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_6_OUTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}回归我们的时空旅行!那么,接下来要去哪?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我的传感器检测到了一株新的植物,用户戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_1_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}更多的植物！更多的朋友！这次我们有什么?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}它可以增强暗影家族中植物的力量.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_1_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}所以...是那种超级厉害的强化?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_1_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}啊,并不.强化后的月光花会向她范围内的植物提供.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_1_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}我们需要穿过黑暗之城才能找到它.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_1_INTRO_8: {SAY:crazydave}听起来像是一次有趣的冒险!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我预感这次可能会有其它人偷偷参与进来...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_3_INTRO_5: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}我被绑架是十分可怕的事! 这简直是亵渎!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们又处于一个锁定的时间坐标里.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_5_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}然而, 我们拥有的植物... 并没有暗影家族的月光花.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_7_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}欢迎,园艺冒险者, 来到我的另一波攻势.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_7_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}然而,今时不同往日, 因为我召唤了来自于其它时间线的僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_7_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}我最为先进的传送门也会在攻势中帮助它们.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_7_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}祝好运, 守护者们.让我们看看在不可避免地交出自己的大脑前你走得了多远.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_7_INTRO_5: {SAY:zombossicon}尊敬的,埃德加 僵王博士
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_7_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}我的数据显示野兽奇异果会来临时救援我们.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_7_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}它也许又小又可爱,但如果受伤到了一定程度, 它会变得超级愤怒.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_7_INTRO_9: {SAY:winnie}然后它就可以对屏幕上的所有僵尸造成伤害!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_7_INTRO_1: {SAY:winnie}保护它会对对抗僵尸大军非常有利... 不论是在预期内或者预期外.
{SAY:winnie}我们已经有僵尸鹦鹉要去处理了, 用户戴夫.
{SAY:winnie}僵王博士可能不再需要蹦极僵尸了.
{SAY:crazydave}哦. 是的. 我真的很讨厌被绑架!
{NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}不要在一个僵尸被暗樱草拖拽时使用逆时草.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_10_INTRO_: {SAY:zombossicon}如果我得不到圣殿的奥秘, 那我会把你和它一同扔进黑暗里.
{SAY:zombossicon}黑暗... 还有大量通往黑暗时代的入口.
{SAY:zombossicon}然后, 我们会公布你的死讯!
{SAY:zombossicon}尊敬的, 埃德加 僵王博士
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}一场大规模袭击即将来临, 用户戴夫.
{SAY:winnie}如果我们成功了, 就可以找到我们的影子朋友.
{SAY:crazydave}一场夺回我们黑暗植物的黑暗战争...合适的!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_10_OUTRO_: {START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我们做到了! 我们又一次挫败了博士先生!
{SAY:crazydave}现在来帮我准备茶, 潘妮. 我们必须让暗影叶感到欢迎!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫,这夜间的环境看起来会更加的严酷.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}我们需要有更多的盟友,这就是我们今天在这里的原因.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_1_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}所以,我们能更快的找到僵尸博士吗?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}是的,但前提是我们要击退这些迎面而来的僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_1_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}我的传感器显示,寒冰菇已经消失很久了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_1_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}但是现在,我们在侏罗纪沼泽发现了它的踪迹,但是它老是喜欢在晚上出现.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_1_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}但是首先我们应穿过这些僵尸,才能开始调查它的踪迹.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_1_INTRO_8: {SAY:crazydave}不管是白天还是晚上,这些住在洞穴里的原始家伙都不是我们现代植物的对手.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_2_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}额……但是这次有其它的僵尸加入战斗.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_2_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}这次,我们需要保持高度警惕.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_2_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}同时把我们的植物也集合起来!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_4_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}不过,我们还没找到它的种子包.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_4_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}不过与此同时,它愿意帮助我们抵御僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_4_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}它的特殊能力相信会帮助我们很多.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_6_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}自从80年代之后我就没见过它们了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_9_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}迄今为止,僵尸渡渡鸟一直是个大麻烦.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_9_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:winnie}但是我相信一定会得到回报的.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_9_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}还有什么比用僵尸渡渡鸟对付僵尸更好的办法呢?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_9_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}一个致命的,不可阻挡的僵尸对抗大群的僵尸,谁会胜利?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_10_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}不过,我会想念这些难得一见的萤火虫的.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_10_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}失陪一下,我想要抓一些萤火虫回家.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_10_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}我们做到了! 寒冰菇已经恢复了! 永久的恢复了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_10_OUTRO_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}而且我还弄到了这些小虫子,一举两得!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_10_OUTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}既然我们现在完成了任务,那么,是时候该回去了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}另一个任务, 另一个需要我们掌握的植物.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}这一次, 阳光豆想要被我们完全理解. 所以另一场训练已经安排上了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}你需要好好利用它的力量来完成这些挑战.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_1_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}太阳的力量, 赋予在了这样一颗小豆子上! 这真是太疯~~狂~~了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_1_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}我们很久以前就已经知道这种事了, 不用那么惊讶, 戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_3_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}绝大多数的生产类植物都罢工了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_3_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}不过还是有希望的. 或许这些国王是解决问题的关键... 在某种意义上.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_3_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}噢! 或许它们会赋予我骑士头盔, 这样我就可以和僵尸战斗了! 真是个好主意, 潘妮!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_4_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}只剩下草坪上这6个还在坚守岗位了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_4_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}困难来临了,我们却如此孤立无援.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_4_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}... 你说的对, 所以我们可以用薄荷糖作为补给品给植物们吗?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_4_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}... 这听起来是个让人忍不住想要薄回的意见.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_4_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}但是, 潘妮, 你想象一下! 它们可能会光合作用释放出薄荷味的清新氧气!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_6_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}夜幕降临, 阳光豆仍然待在这里.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_6_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}它在这场最后的战斗中很危险... 除非我们保护它!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_6_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}让我们击败僵尸, 拯救它吧!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_6_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}挑战结束了. 我们胜利了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_6_OUTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}我们也得到了更好的阳光豆!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_6_OUTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}那些蹩脚的僵尸进攻再也不能阻止我们了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}香蕉火箭炮这次会给我们一个挑战,戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_1_INTRO_2: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}什么?它要向我们发起挑战?那会很疯...狂!!!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}的确如此,这个事情相当难处理.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}我们需要用香蕉火箭炮的优点去通关.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_1_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}...这一点真的很重要,用户戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这次僵尸们将会在未来世界进行一次巨大的攻势.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_3_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}现在我选香蕉,它可以可以帮助我们更快的打僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_3_INTRO_4: {TIRED:crazydave}我什么时候才能获得香蕉火箭炮?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_4_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}这似乎是香蕉火箭炮给的另一个挑战.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_6_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}真是的!僵尸博士在香蕉的帮助下回来了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_6_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}最好的计划就是最简单的计划!大脑?永远是我们的!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_6_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}我们只需要再一次打败！这有多难?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_6_OUTRO_3: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}我知道了更多关于那疯狂的香蕉!真棒!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}比你还疯! 它们创造了一整个弹簧豆史诗任务!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_1_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}又有史诗任务了? 这意味着更多的冒险!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_1_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}这不是在开玩笑, 戴夫. 恐怕这会是一个前所未有的挑战.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_1_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}一个植物能创造的挑战能有多难?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_1_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}这句话可能会作为你的遗言而广泛流传.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_3_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}... 你那些植物的选植物能力和你一样鬼才.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_3_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}难道说疯狂之血脉同时在我和我的植物中流淌?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_3_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}*叹息* 这真是... 非常难办啊.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}终于啊... 我们能喘口气了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_5_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}这是一个有趣且不太难的谜题.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_5_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}只要及时破坏这些冰块就可以了... 看上去挺简单的.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_5_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}好吧... 推冰者也集结! 它们也是不可或缺的一部分.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_6_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}确实... 它们是什么时候长到这么多的?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_6_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}... 我们一直在时间旅行, 不是吗?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_6_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}好吧, 这个理由我勉强接受.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_7_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我觉得我们不会喜欢接下来这一关...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_7_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}因为这一关有非常过分的限制条件.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_7_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}这一定是在哪里出了问题! 我们怎么才能完成这个挑战?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_8_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}可爱的小霉菌们! 你们也是弹簧豆的挑战的一部分吗?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_8_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}这场战斗应该不会比之前的更困难.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_8_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}这句话可能会作为你的遗言而广泛流传!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_8_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}你能不能教育一下你那些植物, 让它们别那么疯狂了?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_8_OUTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}这些关卡狂出了自我, 狂出了风采!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_8_OUTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}而而而且它已经被吓跑了, 我们还是赶紧走吧.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_8_OUTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}我确定我们的邻居会赞成我的.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫,看来我们又回到了起点.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}我们的房子... 我们的前院...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_1_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}太棒了... 你觉得我还能再吃一次我吃过的玉米卷吗?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}还是别想这些事情了,戴夫.我们还有更重要的事情.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_1_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}值得注意的是: 现在这附近有大量僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_1_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}啊... 我怀念过去的美好时光,正是和友好的僵尸邻居们相处的时光
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_2_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}僵尸的攻击一直持续到晚上.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_2_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}幸运的是,在白天的战斗中获得了额外的阳光.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_2_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}夜晚时间,派对时间.我们还有在假日时间剩下的东西!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_2_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}只需要像往常那样,击溃僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_2_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}多用点阳光我手机不会介意的.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_7_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫,埃及艳后现在已经来到了这个时代.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_7_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}它们可以通过它们富有魔力的舞姿来召唤僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_7_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}想必她一定参加过迪斯科舞会吧.:).
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_7_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}或许她也在舞会上遇到了迈克尔杰克逊.:)
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_9_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}这是我们这次小冒险中的最后一天.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_9_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}我的数据分析表明,我们将面临一次大规模战斗.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_9_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}这么说吧,这次我们会遇到很大的问题.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_9_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}我们已经经历很多了,这次能有多糟糕?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_10_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}然而,我们像往常一样,取得了胜利.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_10_OUTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}说到它,我们现在是时候回去追上它了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_10_OUTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}我们很快就回来享受更多的美好时光!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_WINTERMELON_1_INTRO_: {SAY:zombossicon}我已经决定好跨越所以时间线对你这个小地盘发动大规模攻击.
{SAY:zombossicon}你可以试着阻止我,当然你敢的话.
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}看起来这次我们要搬出强大的植物.
{SAY:winnie}所以我建议我们利用西瓜兄弟的强大力量.
{SAY:crazydave}这真是个不错的主意啊,潘妮! 它们的西瓜籽肯定能轻松消灭任何僵尸!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_WINTERMELON_4_INTRO_: {SAY:zombossicon}不论你接下来怎么回答我,我都已经为你准备了另一个.
{SAY:zombossicon}我的机器已经暂时瘫痪了几乎你的所有植物...又一次...
{SAY:zombossicon}你会活下来吗?我当然不希望.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}那是一个很好的三明治!我错过了什么?
{SAY:winnie}僵王博士…额…僵王博士,所以时间不多了.
{SAY:crazydave}所以,是时候继续迎接僵尸了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_WINTERMELON_6_INTRO_: {SAY:zombossicon}看来,你又要破坏我的计划了.
{SAY:zombossicon}所以我别无选择,只能派出巨人僵尸来结束你这小小的旅行计划.
{SAY:zombossicon}永别了~,我的复仇女神.真诚的,埃德加,僵王博士
{SAY:winnie}这次我可以送过来一些阳光,但这需要些时间.
{SAY:crazydave}那么你是时候发光发热了,邻居.
{SAY:crazydave}那么,在潘妮为你提供帮助之前,试着拖住它们!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_WINTERMELON_6_OUTRO_: {SAY:zombossicon}That was awkward, to say the least.
{SAY:zombossicon}但是,我相信,我的下一个计划会摧毁你.
{SAY:zombossicon}现在,我要撤退了,享受你的胜利吧.真诚的,埃德加,僵王博士
{SAY:crazydave}但这仍然值得去庆祝 - 感谢我们的西瓜朋友们!
{SAY:crazydave}我们一定有...蛋糕! 是时候去厨房了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CRYSTALLSHROOM_1_INT: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}哇塞,又回到了4000年前,而且还是在晚上!
{SAY:winnie}是的,戴夫并且我的探测器还检测到周围有什么特别的东西.
{SAY:winnie}我们应该去四处转转,并且面对来袭的僵尸大军
{SAY:winnie}看来，我们永远无法躲僵尸远远的.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CRYSTALLSHROOM_2_INT: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}不好,戴夫,我的传感器检测到周围有大量的沙尘暴!
{SAY:crazydave}所以,我是否应该担心沙尘会进入我的眼睛?
{SAY:winnie}更糟糕的是,这些沙尘暴有点古怪.
{SAY:crazydave}那么,我们最好留意这些沙尘暴.
{SAY:crazydave}当然,最好不要让灰尘进入眼睛.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CRYSTALLSHROOM_4_INT: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}哎嗨!看来我们在这里发现了一个新的植物.
{SAY:winnie}这非凡的水晶菇会发射一种可以穿透一整条路的冰冷水晶.
{SAY:winnie}我们必须要保全她,以便让她入驻我们的种子栏
{SAY:crazydave}刺骨的水晶?这听起来棒极了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CRYSTALLSHROOM_6_INT: {SAY:zombossicon}看来你想获得我们的水晶技术.
{SAY:zombossicon}那么接下来,准备好迎接麻烦吧,我把它翻了倍!
{SAY:zombossicon}那么,祝你好运,守护者.真诚的,埃德加,僵王博士.
{SAY:crazydave}我们的植物,难道是由那个家伙的技术制造的吗?
{SAY:winnie}我们需要更多的时间来调查这个困境.
{SAY:winnie}那么接下来,我们要防御僵尸和沙尘暴.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CRYSTALLSHROOM_7_INT: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我现在能感觉到由恐惧带来的灼烧感.
{SAY:winnie}我不太确定,会不会是因为之前的磨难?
{SAY:crazydave}哦不 我一定是吃错了什么东西
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CRYSTALLSHROOM_10_IN: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}你好,沙漠居民,准备好迎接我最致命的一击吧!
{SAY:zombossicon}当你在思考我的谎言时,我已经从你的植物中提取出了水晶能量!
{SAY:zombossicon}现在灭亡吧! 我会一点一点的消耗你的植物的!
{SAY:zombossicon}反抗都是徒劳! 真诚的,埃德加,僵王博士
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CRYSTALLSHROOM_10_OU: {SAY:winnie}打败僵王博士使水晶菇恢复了所有的力量,戴夫!
{SAY:winnie}她现在加入我们的队伍,来阻止以后僵王博士搞事情.
{SAY:crazydave}多么美好的旅程啊! 再见,上古埃及!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ELECTRICBLUEBERRY_1_: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}看来,我们到这里的目的是为了更多的了解我们的植物.
{SAY:winnie}电击蓝莓将会协助我们迎接接下来的挑战.
{SAY:winnie}它能制造雷暴,使僵尸化为灰烬.
{SAY:winnie}它会首先锁定特殊的僵尸,最后锁定巨人僵尸.
{SAY:crazydave}这个小家伙看起来精力充沛,潘妮! 让我们张开双臂迎接它吧.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ELECTRICBLUEBERRY_3_: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}嘿! 这里看起来将要要举办一场飞行派对!
{SAY:winnie}但是,杨桃和地刺似乎不能单独应对这些僵尸.
{SAY:crazydave}不过,电击蓝莓会将这些飞行僵尸击落.
{SAY:crazydave}是时候让这个派对更加闪耀了,潘妮.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ELECTRICBLUEBERRY_6_: {SAY:winnie}一大群的巨人僵尸将会来进攻!
{SAY:winnie}记住,电击蓝莓会最后锁定巨人僵尸.
{SAY:crazydave}那就保护这些处于危险中的小家伙吧,给它们一个光明的未来.:)
{SAY:winnie}额……所以说你为什么要用双关语来折磨我啊.:)
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}我们取得了最终的胜利! 戴夫.
{SAY:crazydave}这得多亏了这些小家伙们,它们充满了能量.
{SAY:winnie}的确,戴夫,这对我们所有人都有所启发.
{SAY:crazydave}哇哦,潘妮! 你似乎已经接受了双关语的乐趣.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}啊! 未来! 你觉得我们会遇到未来的戴夫吗?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE1_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}毕竟是4000年了! 我相信他会在这个到处都是机器人的世界生存!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE1_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}我探测到有一股能量突然涌入.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE1_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}或许未来的科技已经允许僵尸进入时空裂缝.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE1_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}时空裂缝?那可更疯~狂~了,这些僵尸不是很顽固吗?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE2_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}有一些蜘蛛机器人正在攻击我们的防线!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE2_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}快拿着我的苍蝇拍和拖鞋,我们要去对付这些蜘蛛了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}机甲似乎是'遥远未来'常见的主位
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE5_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}做好准备,他们或许比巨人僵尸更难对付.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE5_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}最好是拿出我们最强力的攻击植物!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE5_INTRO_5: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}毕竟,最好的防守就是进攻,我们需要利用某种方式反击!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE6_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}今年,你的古董大脑将会被我收集.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE6_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}很快就会被收集起来了! 埃德加,僵王博士.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE6_INTRO_4: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}你可要小心啊,邻居.我确信那个家伙没有在说我.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE9_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}迄今为止,这些僵尸还没有用传送们成功的入侵过(
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE9_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}但是这次他们看起来要增加时空裂缝的用法.要保持警惕!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE9_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}那些时空裂缝连接的不是我们去过的地方,对吧?我们会打败他们的!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE10_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}你现在可以决定是否提前出动一台小推车.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE10_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:winnie}只要在合适的时候长按小推车.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE10_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}有时,这是最符合作战策略的方法!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE10_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}确实如此,尤其是面对一大堆机甲怪物的时候.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE10_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}一场巨大的机甲战争即将来临.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE10_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:crazydave}咻! 那是一股巨大的机械浪潮!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE10_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}我的传感器探测到了另一个值得去一顾的时代.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE10_OUTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}我们还在等什么呢? 让我们出发吧!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}未来已经不是之前那样了,好像多了些什么!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}戴夫,我相信僵尸会从时空裂缝中吸取力量.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}我们很可能会遇到更强大的僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}谢天谢地,我发现了一个新的解决方案:能量瓷砖.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}如果你在瓷砖上使用叶绿素的话,
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}相同颜色的所有瓷砖上的植物都会同时获得叶绿素.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_9: {SAY:winnie}为了胜利你可能要尽可能多的使用这种瓷砖.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE13_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我听到音乐了,所以是时候该跳舞了吧.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE13_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}我们能相信僵尸能灵活运用舞蹈吗?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE14_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我们曾经在晚上催眠过那个会跳舞的老家伙.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE14_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}然后,我们可以和它的部下一起跳舞,并同时打败其他僵尸!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE14_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}重温一下过去吧,戴夫.就在这未来的世界里.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE16_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}说到那个夜晚,我不由得想到了橄榄球僵尸!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE16_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}你觉得我们会在这附近遇到他的另一个版本吗?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE16_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}啊.看他打球赛一定会很有趣.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE16_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}当然,当他被催眠时,他只会说'没有脑子',但...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫,僵尸似乎发明了一种新的战术来对付我们.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}那些符文会阻止我们在上面种植地面上的植物.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}不仅如此,一旦被激活,它将屏蔽上面的所有僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}在他们周围我们要小心,因为我担心这个保护罩无法被突破.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}想起来就可怕,那么潘妮,我该怎么击败他呢?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}这个我恐怕没有更好的答案.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫,我发现时间发生了巨大的变化.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}那些被冻住的逆时草或许就是原因所在.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}逆时草会把所有的僵尸送回起点,并回复它们的所有血量.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}谁会在意呢,我们就剩最后一波僵尸要对付了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}他压倒性的力量可以让我们反败为胜.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_OUTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}奇怪的是没有那个家伙的干涉,真是可疑.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_OUTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}我怀疑他赶在我们前面设置了一些东西...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_OUTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}那好吧,我们并没有得到我们想要的结果,那么戴夫,你知道接下来该干什么吗.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_OUTRO_9: {SAY:crazydave}是时候进入时间的长河了,戴夫!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}Isn't it convenient that your neighbor is so helpful in your fight against us zombies?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Crazy David's apparent incompetence is only eclipsed by his usefulness.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {SAY:zombossicon}However, with one secret word my sleeper agent will turn against you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_6: {PLAYFUL}Can I borrow your brains? Um, I mean hot sauce!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_MAGNIFYING_GRASS_FAILUR: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Oops, you should give it another shot!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}I spy with my crazy eye a U.F.B.! An unidentified flying brain!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {SAY:winnie}Something more formidable than a brain lies within.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}I want to eat THAT hypno-taco again! I need my TIME MACHINE!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {TIRED:crazydave}What? Wait a minute... what was I saying again?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_ZOMBIENOTE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}It says there's an error. Can you come here and fix it Penny?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_ZOMBIENOTE_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{TIRED}Did you try unplugging it and plugging it back in?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_GATE_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Woah! What's this? It's blocking our path!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_GATE_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:winnie}We may need to find another way to bypass this.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_GATE_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:winnie}Perhaps we can come back after we're done with other eras?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_GATE_INTRO_4: {EXCITED:winnie}We may use Travel Log for checkpoints in our adventure.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}呃...,这里比北极熊吃冰棒还要冷!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}的确,看来我们到达了冰河世界.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_3: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}我们已经在历史长河中旅行了多远啊!我们现在已经到达了史前!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}我们的确回到了一个有特殊历史意义的时刻,戴夫.但是更重要的是...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_5: {EXCITED:winnie}仪器数据显示,有一块巨大的浮冰在我们的草地上.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}它会把所有的植物和僵尸冻住.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_7: {EXCITED:winnie}即使,我已经做出预言饥饿的僵尸们将会找出解决的办法.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_8: {SAY:crazydave}别担心.我们将会机智地种下植物并且阻止这场僵尸风暴!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE2_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}别四处乱瞧了,潘妮!这些植物的冻斑情况非常严重!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE2_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}是那些这时期的冰风导致的.它们将会固定植物.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE2_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:winnie}我建议是时候让热土豆出场了.她可以融化那些坚冰.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE2_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}我已经对这个好主意感到浑身发暖!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE5_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}呃... 我...们一会可能会遇到暴...风雪.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE5_INTRO_3: {TIRED:winnie}我怀疑这些僵尸有...可能会利用它们去... 阿嚏!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE5_INTRO_4: {TIRED:winnie}... 抱...歉. 防冻技术太差了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}我,僵尸博士. 我写给你另一个可怕的笔记.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}你摊上麻烦事了.大...麻烦.巨人僵尸的麻烦,真的!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}树懒巨人僵尸的碎灭!击碎你们这些渺小的存在,颤抖吧,植物们!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}树懒巨人僵尸将会释放带有史前病毒的小鬼僵尸们!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_5: {SAY:zombossicon}祝你坏运. 致电,僵尸博士.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_6: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}以生物进化论来说,那些僵尸不会进化.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}不会在上百万年,几十亿年,甚至上百亿年内.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE9_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}这些处于危险的植物如此接近僵尸... 这是不可能的!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE9_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}解决方案可能比我们想象的更难懂.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我被这些移动僵尸的滑块弄晕了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}并且事情只会越...来越糟糕. 有人来了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}不不不. 是僵尸,注意, 戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_OUTRO_2: {TIRED:crazydave}它们只是不会拿个脑子去思考!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}仪器数据显示, 尼安德特人僵尸头骨比其它僵尸头骨硬33.2%.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_OUTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}嗯.至少我们存活了下来.让我们离开这里!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE11_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Brrr... I can never g-g-get used to the cold.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE11_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}Or why you seem to be fine in that attire.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE11_INTRO_4: {TIRED:crazydave}What I DO know... is that we have more zombies to defeat!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE11_INTRO_5: {TIRED:crazydave}Regardless of the cold... Or the cold comfort of victory!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE12_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Would it b-b-be too far-fetched to say that only a lava floor can warm me up?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE12_INTRO_2: {TIRED:crazydave}Don't worry Penny! We have lots of fire plants from the conveyor this time!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE12_INTRO_4: {TIRED:crazydave}No problem! Someone has to combat the cold for you!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_6: {TIRED:winnie}The Nether Dodos are a force to be reckoned with.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_7: {TIRED:winnie}They CANNOT be detected unless they fly.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_8: {EXCITED:crazydave}Can we keep one and train her how to fly then?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_9: {TIRED:winnie}No. We do need to find a way to force them to fly though.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_10: {EXCITED:crazydave}Don't worry! I'm sure our neighbor can figure something out with these plants!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_11: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{TIRED:winnie}NO WAIT, WE DON'T HAVE ANY WARM...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_15: {TIRED:winnie}Try to find a way around the freezing wind, then.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_OUTRO_5: {TIRED:winnie}That won't work on me this time.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE17_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}... seems like the c-c-cold's getting to me and my memory.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE17_INTRO_4: {TIRED:winnie}But, your mold colonies have managed to create an interesting challenge this time.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE17_INTRO_5: {TIRED:crazydave}We don't want to hurt Moldies... but we need to plant on those lanes!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE18_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}That's a lot of ice right there.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE18_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}And now I scream for icecream, because only it will melt my frozen heart!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE18_INTRO_5: {TIRED:winnie}Icy a lot more, t-t-too. Future zombies have arrived in the past.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE18_INTRO_6: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}A technological advancement in Frostbite Caves? ABSURD!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Zomboss blows up mines... Mines perish... Then you die!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_INTRO_4: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}You heard that Penny! We have to protect them!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_INTRO_5: {TIRED:crazydave}Not because I want to know their secret lives!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_OUTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}And it will just get worse from here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_OUTRO_3: {TIRED:winnie}The toughest challenges are far from over.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_OUTRO_4: {TIRED:winnie}For now we can leave this place. Go to somewhere warmer.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_OUTRO_5: {TIRED:winnie}Like Wild West... there's another energy spike from there.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_OUTRO_6: {EXCITED:crazydave}Another chance to finally face Dr. Zomboss? Well then, let's time travel!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED: winnie}User Dave, I've detected an incoming ice cube.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_3: {SAY:winnie}Analysis suggests this creepy cube unlocks a chilly challenge.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}You know what I say? Brrrrr-ing it on!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{TIRED:crazydaveicon}Penny, hath you ever tried licking an ice-thickle and got your tongue thtuck to it?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_3: {SAY:crazydaveicon}Uh ... me neither. Thath would be craaaazthy.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_4: {SAY:winnieicon}Sigh. While your tongue heals, please note the strange stone tablet.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_5: {SAY:winnieicon}It appears to be a warning sign, written in Cave僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_6: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}Doesth it warn people not to lick ice-thickles?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_BIG_REWARD_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}You are truly amazing! Most deserving of the name... Senor Pinata!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_BIG_REWARD_INTRO_2: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Have you seen my taco Senor Pinata? It was about this big...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_BIG_REWARD_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}That's it. Please disrupt this anomaly before User Dave gets too attached.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_LEVEL_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}User Dave, this does not look like a party.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_LEVEL_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}It could still be a surprise party, with gifts and everything!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_LEVEL_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}You'll see Penny, I think these zombies are different.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{EXCITED}There is an impending attack on your house in modern times!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}I bet it's not an attack... I bet it's a party! Oh, I hope it's a Pinata Party!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnieicon}It's not a party, there are zombies from all different time periods ready to strike!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_4: {EXCITED:winnieicon}Who knows what else they could have brought with them?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_5: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}Sounds like a party to me! Better hurry up, we don't want to miss out!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}The party is over for now, but those zombies will be back some day.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnieicon}Defending against multiple parties in a row could lead to a massive pinata anomaly.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_OUTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}I can't wait for the next Pinata Party, and the one after that!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_OUTRO_5: {TIRED:crazydaveicon}But those pinatas just remind me of my sad lost taco. Let's go!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_RESET_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}Missing a Pinata Party will reset the build up to the massive pinata anomaly.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_RESET_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnieicon}I won't pretend to understand why, but the data does not lie.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_RESET_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}Just let us know of any more Pinata Parties you detect!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_RESET_INTRO_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}For a party they can be pretty sneaky.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_REWARD_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}What did I tell you Penny? A surprise Pinata Party!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_REWARD_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}Does not compute. It appears a level 3 diagnostic check is in order.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_REWARD_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}Pinatas! Let's bust some open and see what we get!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}然而，僵尸仍然在这里。他们认为在晚上进攻更容易。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}必须保护神殿的秘密不被这些僵尸的夺取。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT1_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}好吧，是时候对这些僵尸们进行进攻了。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}阳光不足，黄金地砖还没有出现
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT3_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}我们需要生产更多的阳光来度过这个夜晚。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT3_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}你确定这不是因为国家植物组织要求我们这样做吗？
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}这些鬼鬼祟祟的僵尸们找到了一种新的方式来进攻我们。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT5_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}不过它们会更努力地窃取我们的阳光--所以要速战速胜。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT5_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}那些不怀好意的窃取阳光的僵尸!我们要让他们知道谁是最快的!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT5_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}细节，细节!我们有僵尸要打败，所以谁在乎呢？
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT8_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}你认为我们能成功阻止僵王博士吗？
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT8_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}... 很奇怪的是，一台时间机器没有与时间有关的问题的答案，哈哈。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT8_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}但我们实际上是在时间乱流中冲浪!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT10_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}于是，宁静的丛林之夜又恢复了以往的宁静。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT10_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}是时候继续我们的时空之旅了
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT10_OUTRO_4: {EXCITED:winnie}振作起来，戴夫。不要像忧郁菇一样那么玄乎和阴郁。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}戴夫, 这不是一般的丛林.仪器数据显示, 这是传说中的失落之城.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY1_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}失落之城?潘妮! 我们找到它了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY1_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}除了失落之城, 我还能在哪里找到我丢失的平底锅?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY1_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}你一直在公然反抗所有的逻辑学理论, 戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY2_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}仪器数据显示,上面传来了某种活动的信号.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY2_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}也许这是一个老天爷的馈赠吧!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY2_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}从统计学的角度来说, 你说的那件事的可能性简直就是无稽之谈.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY2_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}我相信这是一个新的僵尸威胁. 我们应该对那些意料之外的的客人留心防御.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}这是第一个坚不可摧.未来还会有更多的坚不可摧.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY3_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫, 仪器数据显示,时间开始弯曲.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY3_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}某些时代的僵尸可能会在别的时代里出现.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY3_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}从现在起我们必须要更加小心.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY3_OUTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}谁会在意呢? 我很疯~~狂~~ 向前进!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们将会有一场艰苦的战斗.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY5_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}我们不仅没有什么植物可以选择, 而且能够种植植物的数量也很有限.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY5_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}对快速僵尸快速处理, 我们会渡过难关.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}历史文献表明,这里的人崇尚太阳, 阳光应该充足.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}我建议我们在那些金色的砖上种植植物.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}只要上面有植物, 它们就应该会不断地产生阳光.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_4: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}很抱歉打断你的探险, 失落之城的冒险者.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_5: {SAY:zombossicon}告诉你一个不幸的消息, 失落巨人僵尸正打算在今天毁灭你们.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_6: {SAY:zombossicon}准备好你的脑子, 成为古老的历史吧!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_9: {SAY:winnie}我们稍后会追上它-巨大的问题即将到来!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY8_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}今天的黄金浓度似乎要高得多.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY8_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}黄金砖将会时不时的产生, 如果它们能产生的话.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY8_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}我们将会变得十分富有!... 但是它们为什么会产生?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY8_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}丛林中蕴藏着许多秘密, 戴夫. 我们最好不要质疑它.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY9_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}您可能会发现您错过的有关植物和僵尸的某些细节.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY9_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}... 免得你想当然代入原版.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY10_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}失落之城将完好无损.没有僵尸会发现它.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY10_OUTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}是时候进入下一个时代了! 会是怎么样的呢?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY11_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Back to the jungle! Looking as lost as ever!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY11_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Be careful of the stronger adventuring zombies, though.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY11_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}THEY should be careful of the plants instead!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY11_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}After all, exploring the jungle can be dangerous!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY14_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Do you think I can convey my thoughts to Mr. Boss guy?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY14_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}I somehow doubt that, User Dave. For now, we have a conveyor challenge ahead.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY14_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Good enough for me! I'll just send my notes on this!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY14_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Sadly, we can't. Hopefully we can configure this conveyor to be two ways, one day.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY14_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}For now, we'll just have to settle with plants delivered towards us from the unknown.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY16_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Ouchie! The jungle sure has a lot of bugs!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY16_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}I have detected the presence of some unique trap tiles on the lawn.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY16_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}When triggered by a plant or a zombie, a swarm of bugs will appear to bite both!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY16_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}You'll probably need some strong defensive plants to protect other plants from the bugs...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY16_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Or, alternatively, find certain plants that won't trigger the traps, like Iceberg Lettuce and Stunion.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY16_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}Where's bug spray when you need it?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY18_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}The ground's trembling! Can you feel it?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY18_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Oh no... I fear that one of the temples has been busted open!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY18_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Now the zombie can use its power to embiggen themselves to MONSTROUS SIZE!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY18_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}... yeah... don't remind me of the nightmare back home.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY19_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}I smell jungles! And more buzzing sounds!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY19_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Something is hidden here... Keep an eye out for anything out of place.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY20_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}You seem to have struck gold with these newly found Gold Tiles.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY20_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}But my zombies shall crush you and claim what are rightfully ours: Your brain, and the secret of the temple.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY20_INTRO_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}Seems like a huge siege is coming towards us.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY20_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}We'll make use of these Tiles and stop them in their track!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY20_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}The temple has been salvaged once more, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY20_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}We may need to go back to the Dark Ages now... my sensors feel a disturbance.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY21_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Ah, back to the City of the Lost!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY21_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Be wary though User Dave, as we will encounter far stronger zombie hordes this time.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY21_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}But our plant group has also expanded as well! Time to take them head on!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY22_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}My sensors detected that Sun Focant has made a return.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY22_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Perhaps we should keep an eye on them, lest they snatch our sun away.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY22_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Forget about that! I forgot how many bugs there are in this jungle!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY22_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}Come on then, I will help you look for your bug spray. Again.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY24_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Hey, look at that Penny! Some mimes!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY24_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}It's good to find entertainment in the middle of nowhere, right?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY24_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Be cautious, User Dave. These Mime僵尸are no ordinary mimes.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY24_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}If left alone long enough, they will destroy the leftmost plants on their lanes.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY24_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}However, they seem to enjoy eating plants from a distance as well.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY24_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}They may be distracted and unable to attack while eating, so we should take advantage of that.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY24_INTRO_8: {SAY:crazydave}We should do that by getting a front row seat to their shows! For free!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY27_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Bugs, bugs and more bugs! Have you found my bug spray yet?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY27_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Not yet, User Dave, but I think we have more pressing matters.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY27_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}I detected that these Bugs might be imposters, mimicking as regular Bug僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY27_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}They may drop some unexpected surprises, so watch out.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY27_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}No, User Dave. No Imps are involved, I believe.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY28_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}These Mimes seem to be everywhere, Penny!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY28_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}Today they seem to have chosen the trapped in a box act!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY28_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Well, a giant icecube is like a cold box, right?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}It is time to enact my second big attack.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}How do you like my newest performers? Have their shows been entertaining and deadly?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}Surely, you will also enjoy a final show from my improved Mimes!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_INTRO_5: {SAY:zombossicon}I sincerely hope it will be a show to die for. Literally!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_INTRO_7: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}More Mimes! And they are preparing something big for us to watch, Penny!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}Yes. We may need all our knowledge to best these Mimes in their own game.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_INTRO_9: {SAY:winnie}I have successfully disabled the recharge nerf for this battle only, at least.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_INTRO_10: {SPECIAL2:crazydave}To out-mime a mime? Sounds CRAZYYYYY! Let's do it then!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}That's the last of the zombie attack here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}May the temples be restful once more, and may we never see another mime again.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_OUTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Aw, but I have been enjoying their acts!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_OUTRO_4: {EXCITED:winnie}And I don't. Plus, we have Dark Ages to defend as well.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY30_OUTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Well then, as they say, au revoir!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY: {SAY:winnie}My sensors indicate this amulet points the way to a long-lost challenge.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_ZOMBIENOTE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Well lookie-here, Penny! It's a treasure map!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_ZOMBIENOTE_2: {SAY:winnie}My analysis suggests that the origins of that map are highly suspect.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_ZOMBIENOTE_3: {SAY:crazydave}It has a big red X on it, Penny. When have big red Xs ever been bad?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}现在这有个传统的休闲小游戏.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}破相者! 一阵从过去到你脸上的冲击!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{TIRED}那叫砸罐子, 用户戴夫. 砸罐子.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_INTRO_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}那样的话, 那就是到你花瓶上的!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}为了更好的对抗僵尸, 我们要锻炼我们的大脑.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_2: {SAY}我设计了一个游戏来作为特训.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_3: {SAY}你需要仔细考虑原始土豆雷的位置, 让他们消灭所有僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_4: {SAY}一个路障僵尸需要两个地雷, 一个铁桶僵尸需要三个.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_5: {SAY}你在每条线上最多种植两个地雷.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_6: {SAY}当你种植完成后, 等一小会再开始.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_7: {SAY}一些有用的僵尸会帮你触发地雷.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_8: {SAY}如果你没能击杀所有僵尸, 你可以重新开始.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_INTRO_9: {SAY}你将面临 8 个挑战 - 尝试一次就打败他们吧. 祝你好运.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_ENDER_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}如果你想回忆一下这个游戏怎么玩...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_ENDER_INTRO_2: {SAY}你需要仔细考虑原始土豆雷的位置, 让他们消灭所有僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_ENDER_INTRO_3: {SAY}一个路障僵尸需要两个地雷, 一个铁桶僵尸需要三个.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_ENDER_INTRO_4: {SAY}你在每条线上最多种植两个地雷.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_ENDER_INTRO_5: {SAY}当你种植完成后, 等一小会再开始.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_ENDER_INTRO_6: {SAY}一些有用的僵尸会帮你触发地雷.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MINIGAME_MINESET_ENDER_INTRO_7: {SAY}如果你没能击杀所有僵尸, 你可以重新开始.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN0_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}This seems to be its own pocket dimension...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN0_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}I suspect that new challenges await us in front of this area.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN0_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}These battles will surely be unlike any of the others we have faced so far.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COMMUNITY_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}这可能是其他时间旅行者的制造.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COMMUNITY_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}所以... 用疯狂戴夫的话说就是... 社区关?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Penny! A random length of sewer pipe!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_MODERN_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {SAY:winnie}Be careful, User Dave. That pipe is part of a municipal mulch of endless engagement!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}它可能看起来像道路的尽头……
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_2: {SAY:crazydaveicon}但在时空旅行中寻找玉米卷时，路还得继续走。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY:winnieicon}也别忘了在无尽模式里练习进阶的种植技术。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}潘妮是对的。保持敏锐是很重要的。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_5: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}你永远不知道什么时候你会在你的草坪上发现僵尸。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_OUT_OF_CONTENT_SOON_9: {SAY:crazydaveicon}但如果你真的在你的草坪上发现了我的锅......
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE1_INTRO_2: {SHOUT:crazydave}但是这里有海盗!我很想见识你们的鹦鹉和木制假腿!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE2_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}哗啦啦!看来这些僵尸有一些技能!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE2_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}你说的对, 戴夫. 这些飞索会成群结队地出现.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE2_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}... 它们只是装饰品. 否则我们将会击落另一艘船.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE4_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}吓我一跳! 每个地方都有小鬼!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE4_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}它们是僵尸. 它们没有什么感觉.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE8_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}提个建议:你们的小帆船不够大.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE10_INTRO_2: {TIRED:crazydave}有可能它们是想邀请我们去它们的船?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE10_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}恰恰相反,戴夫.我们应该为迄今为止最强大的海盗袭击做好准备.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE10_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}您可能需要开始使用更昂贵的植物,因为廉价的植物可能防御不了很长时间.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE10_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}用这个西瓜投手来练习对抗这种猛烈的冲击.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE10_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY}我准备好了. 海盗很好,但我想我想家了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE10_OUTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}没时间了,我们还有一个僵尸博士要见!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE11_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我望见广阔的海域！有更多的僵尸吗？
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE11_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}出现了更多的海盗僵尸，而且实力更强。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE11_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}我们会让他们走上木板！然后我们就可以称霸海域！再一次！
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE14_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}我们永远不知道对僵尸有什么期待。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE14_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}哦，但我知道他们能从我这里得到什么。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE14_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}大海中最好的海盗! 呦呵！
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE18_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}最后一站......但400个阳光？因为我疯了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE18_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}我们可能需要找到一种方法来解决这个问题。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE18_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}那就为太阳而战斗吧!就像这些海盗的战斗方式一样!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE20_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}好吧，不管它是什么，我们又有一面海盗旗要来了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE20_OUTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}你又一次从我的另一个陷阱中逃脱了。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE20_OUTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}请注意，除非你向我们拱手相让你的大脑，否则我们将别无选择，只能加强我们的僵尸军团。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE20_OUTRO_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}大海是我们可以航行的!呦呵呦呵!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE20_OUTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}僵王博士再次逃脱了我们的囚禁。在僵尸的船上也没有他的踪迹。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE20_OUTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}但是，我确实在冰河时代发现了另一个能量峰值。这可能值得研究一下。
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE20_OUTRO_9: {EXCITED:crazydave}是时候再次启航我们的时空之旅了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Finally, one of these pirates dropped some booty!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {PLAYFUL:winnie}I'm detecting something more challenging than treasure inside.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_WORLDMAP_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{特点11}Shiver me timbers. I've always wanted to do some swashbuckling!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_WORLDMAP_INTRO_2: {PLAYFUL}And I've always wanted a poop deck of my own.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_WORLDMAP_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{TIRED}Yes, let's go. I'd hate for him to improvise a poop deck here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_PIRATE_ZOMBIENOTE_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}To treasure! It says no zombies. Maps don't lie!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_POWERUPS_TUTORIAL_INITIAL_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED}You have some Power Ups! I'll show you how to use them.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_POWERUPS_TUTORIAL_INITIAL_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{特点6:crazydave}Yeah, and now we can break the seal. Let's get crazy!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_POWERUPS_TUTORIAL_REPEAT_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}You can try out your Power Ups for free here!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TRAINING_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}我建了一个训练场供你练习.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TRAINING_INTRO_2: {SAY}为了去解锁它,你必须遵循我的指示.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TRAINING_INTRO_3: {SAY}完成这个空关后, 失落之城的无尽模式将会开启.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TRAINING_INTRO_4: {SAY}你必须选择一颗植物,然后通过获得更多的植物继续正常游戏.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TRAINING_INTRO_5: {SAY}然而，无尽模式会立即让你失败.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_TRAINING_INTRO_6: {SAY}失败后,返回地图,然后你就会解锁训练模式.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_QUEST_INTRO_3: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}What's that, Travel Log? You provide guidance, progress and rewards?
